title: Large 2 bedroom townhouse for short term rent
description:
We are faculty at Jefferson University and will be traveling for the spring/summer. We are short renting our townhouse from April 9th till mid-August. You'll love this super cute bright furnished 3 level 2 bedrooms / 1.5 bathrooms house with a small backyard and a roof terrace. The townhouse is located in a very quiet street facing the Spring Gardens park. It is within walking distance to the center city, Fairmount Ave, the Philadelphia Art Museum, Broad Street, and more. The washer/dryer is conveniently located on the same floor as the bedrooms. The townhouse is fully furnished including a full-sized bed in the master and a twin-size bed in the second bedroom. There is a full bathroom and a toilet on the second level.
Please contact us if interested in staying for the whole time (preferably) or part of the spring/summer (Min. stay 1 month). First month's rent and security deposit ($2,000) due upon signing. The tenant is responsible for all utilities and services except internet. That includes gas, electricity, and water bill.
We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Mid March. ABL //Access to PA-252, 3 beds, 2 baths = PA = 19133.
description:
RENT $780, Available Now! (showing march 15th). 3 beds, 2 baths, 1,600 sqft. Nice home in very desirable Newtown Square, Neighborhood, minutes from downtown Newtown Square, minutes from great hiking, fishing, biking, access to PA-252. All new LVP flooring downstairs and in bathrooms, as well as new carpet upstairs. Entire house just repainted! (Updated photos!)
Great floor plan with high vaulted ceilings in main living area. Living area features cozy propane burning stove (new) w/ beautiful brick surround. Kitchen features breakfast bar seating, hardwood cabinetry, dishwasher, refrigerator, electric stove, pantry. Kitchen opens to eating area as well as living room. Double sliding glass doors lead out onto the large front deck. Master bedroom located on upper level, full bath w/ small walk out deck, perfect for your morning coffee! Upstairs you'll find an open loft area (could be used as office space). Main level has two guest bedrooms, utility room, pantry and a full bathroom with tub. The garage with rollup door, perfect for small car or all your summer and winter equipment; skis, snowboards, bikes, fishing equipment… Please only serious applicants that can pass a background check should apply at ; ; -  ______________ lucycarolina60gmail.com

title: Fabulous spacious 3 bedroom home for rent
description: Beautiful 3 bedroom 2 full baths, 1 half bathroom semi-detached home close to Temple University and the Downtown core just minutes away from stores and transportation. This brand new home has been renovated from top to the bottom.  It boast unique hardwood floors, porcelain tiled bathrooms all with gold finishings.  The Kitchen is a beauty bright white again with all gold finishings. High-end granite counter tops and stainless steel appliances the oven is custom  built-in. Nestled right between the Kitchen and the Living room is a powder room/half bathroom. The railing are made out of strong wrought iron long lasting and beautiful. The Master-bedroom has a master ensuite with a stand up shower that can fit 2, 3, or even 4, the beautiful blue and gold vanity just pops.  All the  bathrooms are gorgeous  and nicely done. The basement is completely finish there is enough room for a bedroom and an entertainment area. It has a full bathroom with a stand up shower

This beautifully updated & expanded Ranch home is situated on over a quarter acre lot and features 3 bedrooms, 3 full baths, a spacious living room with tons of natural light, completely updated eat in kitchen with an abundance of cabinets and stainless steel appliances. The exterior features a rear covered patio with rear & side yard, perfect for spring and summer entertaining as well as an oversized 2 car garage with electric opener & interior access.  Located just off of the intersection of Knights Rd & Woodhaven Rd, the entire Philadelphia metro area is at your fingertips. Schedule your appointment today, this one won't last!

title: 3-Bedroom Townhome with Gated Patio
description:
Bring in the Spring with this 3 bedroom townhome. This home offers comfort, space and privacy. Inside you will find tons of storage and counter space, in-unit laundry, updated bathrooms, beautiful wood flooring, a freshly designed Ikea kitchen, and lots of natural light. Just outside your front door you will find a large private, gated patio and private, assigned parking.  Main Line Village townhomes are in the heart of Ardmore and are within the Lower Merion School District.
Located in one of the most convenient neighborhoods along the Main Line. You have transportation, shopping, and dining just steps away! Only a short walk from the AMTRAK/SEPTA station, Ardmore Farmers Market, Trader Joe’s and downtown Ardmore. Minutes from Wynnewood, Narberth, Haverford College, Bryn Mawr College and Villanova.
